content: complimentary pattern acorn street cap design by mary pranica no 1313 no 1326 no 1309 dark chocolate a mossy green b earth ivy c 50g hank mini hank mini hank no 1302 no 1312 no 1303 gravel road d drift wood e highland fleece f mini hank mini hank mini hank no 1323 no 1311 ember glow g rusted roof h mini hank mini hank experience level - intermediate materials - woolstok worsted 100% fine highland wool 50g/123yds 1 hank a - woolstok worsted bundle 100% fine highland wool 21 mini hanks 5g/12yds each 1 bundle fall festival - size 6 4mm 16 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge - size 7 4 5mm 16 circular needle or size needed to obtain gauge - size 7 4 5mm double pointed needles or size needed to obtain gauge acorn street cap no 202223 - stitch marker design by mary pranica pattern - tapestry needle aside from falling leaves every autumn acorns cover the size ground under oak trees the acorn street cap takes its motif - one from the colorful foliage and the tiny nuts finished measurements - circumference 20 - height 9 gauge - in stockinette stitch 22 sts and 28 rnds = 4 using larger needles complimentary pattern blue sky fibers abbreviations circ circular co cast on k knit k2tog knit 2 stitches together m marker meas measures ndl s needle s p purl pm place marker rem remaining repeat repeat round s round s st s stitch es st st stockinette stitch when working flat knit all rs row purl all ws row when working in the round knit all rounds * repeat the directions between the asterisks as many times as indicated stitch pattern 1x1 rib all rnds *k1 p1 repeat from * to end special methods stranded color a method of color knitting in which two or more yarns are worked at the same time with yarns not in use stranded loosely across the wrong side of the piece notes change to double pointed needles when stitches no longer fit comfortably on circular needle cap with smaller circ ndl and using a co 110 sts pm and join to work in the round being careful not to twist sts work in 1x1 rib for 1½ switch to larger ndls and work 3 rnds in st st work rnds 1 30 of the colorwork chart with a work one round in st st crown decrease round 1 *k8 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 99 sts round 2 k round 3 *k7 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 88 sts complimentary pattern blue sky fibers round 4 k round 5 *k6 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 77 sts round 6 k round 7 *k5 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 66 sts colorwork chart round 8 k 30 round 9 *k4 k2tog repeat from * to end of round 55 sts 29 color key round 10
